shri lankawe daha hathara wani agamathi waraya washayen di. mu. jayarathna mahatha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha idiriye eeye (21) sawasa 6.04 ta yedunu suba mohothin araliyagaha mandiraye pawathi cham uthsawayaka di diwurum dunneya.shri lanka nidahas pakshaye jyeshtathama samajikayaku wana jayarathna mahatha ema pakshaye jyeshta upa sabhapathiwarayaku menma podu jana eksath peramune maha lekamwaraya da we.gampola doluwa gramaye di warsha 1931 juni masa 04 wana dina upatha lada ee mahatha shri lanka nidahas pakshaye 13wani samajikaya washayen pakshayata bandune hitapu agramathya, diwangatha es.
